modName: The Scarlet King by Jered Gunn - DELETED
summary: A simple mod that adds a favorite epic tale to the already epic world of Skyrim, The Scarlet King by Jered Gunn.
descriptionHtml:
An epic but short story written by Jered Gunn. which has also been made into a video by Vindsvept with narration by S. Scott O'Neal you can find them both at: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfSUheoljDlGDjerRylO4Nw  https://www.youtube.com/user/nookncrannygame
I do not own the contents of the book nor do I pass it off as my own work I simply enjoyed the story enough to want to carry it around in my adventures in Skyrim. The book is located in Breezehome on the shelf on the first floor near the table All credit for this mod goes to Jered Gunn, Vindsvept, and S. Scott O'Neal, [b][i]I do not claim ownership[/i][/b], if any of these creators wish to have the file removed I will do so
author: DiabolicLycanthrope
